summary: Mission v9.6.7 Validation Finale - ALL CODE AUDITS AND VISUAL TESTS PASSED. Verified: (1) paddingTop: 5px in PartnersCarousel.js L202, (2) height: 90vh in App.js L3760, (3) gap-3 (12px) for icons in PartnersCarousel.js L666, (4) z-index: 50 for lang-selector in App.css L783, (5) Set() deduplication in PartnersCarousel.js L487, (6) Google Login at TOP and Devenir Partenaire at BOTTOM in CoachLoginModal.js, (7) window.location.assign() for FLASH redirect in App.js L3389/3404/3416

context_for_next_testing_agent: Mission v9.6.7 is a VALIDATION mission. All code audits confirmed via grep commands. Visual tests via Playwright confirmed: minimal black space (5px paddingTop), icons separated with gap-3, Sessions section visible below Reels, Coach Login Modal shows Google button at top and Devenir Partenaire at bottom.

set_deduplication.value: const seen = new Set(); data.filter with seen.has(key)

button_order_modal.order: Google at TOP (Y=380), Devenir Partenaire at BOTTOM (Y=484)

minimal_black_space.description: First partner card starts at Y=24px, minimal gap to video
